snippet.title: How to determine the height of a triangle when given the area
snippet.description:
Learn how to find the area and perimeter of triangles. A triangle is a shape of three sides. The area of a shape is the measure of the portion enclosed by the shape while the perimeter of a shape is the measure of the outline enclosing the shape.

The area of a triangle is given by half the product of the base and the perpendicular height while the perimeter of a triangle is the sum of the lengths of the three sides.
#geometry #areaperimeter
tags: determine the height of triangle given area
determine the area of a triangle given values for the base b and the height h
how to find the height of a triangle
